## About datasets
[scRNAseq of retrotransposon from adult GBM BAM dataset](https://trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/?study=SRP227039)

## Install and Load libraries

```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(Matrix)
```

## Load aggregated data
10x combine

```{r}
combined <- Read10X("/home/samkyy/scratch/RetroTransposonAnalysis/cellranger_outputs/aggr_none/outs/filtered_feature_bc_matrix")

# create seurat object

combined_brain <- CreateSeuratObject(counts=combined,project="combined",names.field = 2,names.delim = "-")
orig_id <- combined_brain@meta.data$orig.ident
names(orig_id) <- rownames(combined_brain@meta.data)
```
